title: 703: $100K BITCOIN EARLY AS NEXT MONTH SAYS BLOOMBERG ANALYST AS GOLD INVESTORS MOVE TO BTC AND ETHEREUM!
description:
Gold is experiencing outflows as investors embrace crypto's such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, according to Bloomberg commodity strategist Mike McGlone.

McGlone predicts a $100K BTC price as early as October as a result of a futures-based Bitcoin ETF, which he says could be launched by the end of next month.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
